Uses of Interface
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.DisplayMediator

Packages that use DisplayMediator
Package
Description
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller
'Controller' level of the application's MVC architecture. Contains classes the roles of which are :
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core
Contains the application's core classes, those that are in charge of initializing every core and common component, and of controlling the execution flow.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards
Contains all components defining the different types of cards that are used in this game with their effects, as well as structures for easing their manipulation.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.flow
Contains all classes in charge of controlling the flow of the match, aggregating together and supervising the model's components.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players
This package contains all elements defining the players, their possible actions within the game and the notifications they can send towards the view level of the MVC architecture.
